required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: the Evaluation of the Efficacy of TCI66207 on the Skin.
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Skin Efficacy of TCI66207

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to explore the evaluation of the efficacy of TCI66207 deep-sea live-face bacteria on the skin.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Subjects will be tested in the 4th week.
primary_outcome.description: Corneometer® CM825 was utilized to measure skin moisture. Units: arbitrary Corneometer® units 0-120

primary_outcome.time_frame: Subjects will be tested in the 4th week.
primary_outcome.description: Cutometer® dual MPA 580 was utilized to measure skin elasticity (parameter R2). Units: μm penetration depth into the probe opening, expressed as curvesCorneometer® units 0-120

primary_outcome.time_frame: Subjects will be tested in the 4th week.
primary_outcome.description: VISIA Complexion Analysis System was utilized to measure wrinkles. Units: arbitrary units

primary_outcome.measure: The change of skin collagen density
primary_outcome.time_frame: Subjects will be tested in the 4th week.
primary_outcome.description: DermaLab® USB - 20 MHz High Freq. Ultrasound probe was utilized to scan and analyze skin collagen density. Units: Intensity score

primary_outcome.time_frame: Subjects will be tested in the 4th week.
primary_outcome.description: VISIA Complexion Analysis System was utilized to measure skin texture. Units: arbitrary units

primary_outcome.time_frame: Subjects will be tested in the 4th week.
primary_outcome.description: VISIA Complexion Analysis System was utilized to measure skin texture. Units: arbitrary units

intervention.description: Use it twice a day after washing your face in the morning and evening for a total of 4 weeks.
Use it twice a day after washing your face in the morning and evening for a total of 4 weeks.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Healthy volunteers aged above 20 years old
2. Subject has dull skin.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. .Subject with diseases of the skin, heart, liver, kidney, endocrine and other organs and patients with mental illness (according to medical history).
2. Subjects who have known cosmetic, drug or food allergies, difficulty in digestive tract absorption or disorder.
3. Female who is pregnant or nursing or planning to become pregnant during the course of the study.
4. Received facial laser therapy, chemical peeling or UV overexposure in the past 4 weeks.
5. Subjects who have large spots (area >3 square centimeter) or abnormal acne.

overall_official.affiliation: Chia Nan University of Pharmacy & Science
